instanceVariables.name: stelliumStockpile
instanceVariables.desc: Amount of Stellium the player has accumulated.

instanceVariables.name: yearsElapsed
instanceVariables.desc: Number of game years elapsed since game start.

instanceVariables.name: selectedPlanetUid
instanceVariables.desc: UID of currently selected planet, or -1 if no planet selected.

instanceVariables.name: overviewMode
instanceVariables.desc: True if the UI is in overview mode (zoomed out to see the whole sector at once).
